products.name: THE NOTORIOUS B.I.C. - FROZEN
products.description: Combine ingredients in a blender. Add ice and blend. Garnish with coffee grounds and enjoy!

products.name: THE NOTORIOUS
products.description: Fill glass with ice Top with Proper No. Twelve Whiskey

products.name: PROPER NEAT
products.description: Pour Proper No. Twelve Whiskey into rocks glass

products.name: PROPER & GINGER
products.description: Fill glass with ice Pour Proper No. Twelve over ice Top with ginger ale Stir Garnish with lime wedge

products.name: PROPER & COLA
products.description: Fill glass with ice Pour Proper No. Twelve Whiskey over ice Top with Cola

products.name: PROPER PICKLEBACK
products.description: Pour one shot of Proper No. Twelve Whiskey Pour one shot of pickle juice Garnish pickle juice shot with a pickle slice

products.name: PROPER MANHATTAN
products.description: Combine Proper No. Twelve Whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters into a mixing vessel Add ice and stir Strain into a coupe/martini glass Garnish with a cherry

products.name: PROPER CRAIC WATER
products.description: Build in highball glass over ice Top w/ Mineral Water Garnish w/ Lime Wedge

products.name: PROPER SHIRLEY
products.description: Build in highball glass over ice Garnish with Maraschino Cherries (or Lime Wedge)
